subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Although Rachel Alexandra is capable of running back in two short weeks and probably lapping this field of 3-year-old boys in the Preakness, the question of why she needs to do it ought to be asked.
snippet: Although Rachel Alexandra is capable of running back in two short weeks and probably lapping this field of 3-year-old boys in the Preakness, the question of why she needs to do it ought to be asked.
